(When did this turn into a contest?)
You sound like you have... issues, Jolyne. Maybe see a psychiatrist?
Well, this is more or less the beginning, but, you know, semantics.
Can you do that? I won't stop you if you want to, Zoey.
(Socks seemed like they'd be an easy choice for Jolyne... but maybe she just isn't very bright.)
Oh, you actually had a bra under there. They're so similar in shape I thought you skimped out on one!
You do tend to stumble on your words, Marinette, but I think that makes you rather endearing!
(I'm a practitioner of Kurain myself.)
A game like this isn't for the faint of heart, obviously.
Can we drop the subject now?
...There was a sword there?
Too prideful, huh?
(I'm pretty sure you've been taking this seriously all along...)
I suppose no one's stopping you, but it's kind of poor form, right?
It really was just bad luck! I wouldn't lie to you!
After all, I know a stall tactic when I see one.
(This was just the opener. It'll only get tougher!)
But it's also very exotic!
And the necklace? How nice of you!
It's nice to unwind with a friendly game, right?
Hardly! Your arm's burnt! We need to take you to a ward, quickly!
Who cares? That might be permanent damage to your arms!
(Does Shimakaze... think she's a warship? No, that's ridiculous.)
Are you... okay? That was really close to some vital organs.
Anyone's ears would ring with an explosion so close to their ears.
As valuable evidence as it is, we need to keep going, okay Sola?
That's nice. Some friendly competition never hurts!
Judging is best left to... well, the Judge. Take off what you want.
...(Was that an attempt to fool us?)
Duh? Is that all?
Forgive and forget, I say. It's not as if picking the ribbon was a crime.
From you? Well, no, but...
It could have been a lot worse, that's true...
That's probably the smallest thing you have, yeah...
It'd fly in a court of law, so obviously.
(You look proud of yourself for that one...)
The only "trick" that ribbon's doing is delaying a much more substantial loss.
They'll be returned later... I think.
Usually it's the opposite with my witnesses. Glad you're more reasonable, Zizou.
You sound like you're getting your terminologies mixed up. Say that again?
You'll get holes in them that way.
Never heard of "syega" magic. Is that a new act?
Really? They look like ballet shoes to me, personally.
...Not even remotely.
Nervous, ~name~?
You were ready for this, weren't you?
What I wouldn't do for Mr. Justice's perception skills right about now.
Talk about eye candy!
So, uh, guess I'm not the only top-heavy one.
(Not the most modest lady, are you Alice?)
This isn't that type of game, but I'd still be happy to put lotion on your back if you want.
...Spotless! I'm impressed.
I suppose less is more when it comes to wrestling, but did you really have to wear your outfit here?
Is there some sort of overlap between wrestling and street fighting?)
Don't stare...don't stare...
Pull it together, Mia...
I call Ms. ~name~ to take the stand.
Go nice and slow for us.
Will the gun be involved?
Okay, fun's over. You can ditch the costume now.
Seems you're out. Guess I'm the better lawyer after all.
That's a shame. I expected more from a renowned game expert.
Huh. That turned around quickly.
Really? Not the first choice I would've expected from you.
There's only so much hair to shave. And, well, everything's exposed to us anyway.
Will you show off your burlesque experience, or is it more tricks for you?
Oh, okay then. Jolyne doesn't seem to mind having to do it anyway.
(She's a slippery one... who knows how this will go.)
That's one less humiliation for you, Ms. Li. Way to go!
Well, I guess you don't have to.
Just to make sure: you do know what masturbation is, right?
You ejected her on your own?
You get the idea, right? Just rub yourself a ton. You'll do fine.
Well, you're a flashy woman, so let's see how you put those skills to work elsewhere.
(She self-destructed? But she has nothing left... Maybe she really is what she claims.)
How did...? Sleight of hand?
Don't stare...don't stare...
Pull it together, Mia...
Don't be shy. You've seen me at my worst, after all.
Just my luck.
Maybe I'll take some of the evidence home...
Oh, you made quite the crime scene...
How quaint.
I like them, they're really cute.
Still think you'll be fine? As a frequent bluffer myself, I can easily tell.
(I didn't notice before, but apparently Tojiko's been playing along with us.)
Alright, alright. I won't say anything.
We've already had the other half exposed. What else is there?
You were very brave. Fantastic job.
I don't think a real life ship could continue in these conditions...
Let your inhibitions go, and move on.
Are you... getting off on this?
(I should've taken in more French at Tres Bien, I suppose.)
Oh! I guess that's one way to make your intentions clear.
Alright, Amalia. I'll play your game. Let's kill those other flowers, too.
Right. I'm honestly impressed you came this far.
If this is a distraction... it's quite effective.
Guess if you play with a million girls, it'd work on one eventually...
Apparently Trucy's not the only one with magic undergarments.
I believe you on that front.
You seem frustrated. All you have to do is not lose again! Easy!
...It's still pretty humiliating.
How nice! Even so close to a loss, you found a friend!
Are you just saying that because Ms. Basil Elden is in the middle of something?
Passive-agressive, are we?
Flattery will get you everywhere, it seems.
She's not wrong, you know. You have a great body!
The atmosphere in here just got very awkward...
(Sounds rough. At least my world's prisoners seem to fare better.)
Took you along enough. I see that eyepiece works wonders.
(If I'm not mistaken, you're more interested than she is...)
Interesting. I've seen a few breakdowns end with torn clothes, but never anything... risque.
Perhaps. Let's move on, you two.
Interesting. I've seen a few breakdowns end with torn clothes, but never anything risque.
This is true... how are you just noticing, Zoey?
I'll... pass. I recommend you pass too, ~player~.
I guess tuning her out didn't quite work.
Come to think of it, you burned her gown earlier too...
But it's exciting, too!
(I'll take a few glances, but that's all.)
You can trust her. She's right, after all.
Maybe don't go yelling that in the streets...
(She counted down and I still wasn't ready...)
Well, if she says so, enjoy, ~player~.
A little bittersweet. But worth it.
If they ever find out, give the Agency a call, okay? We can help you out.
Nothing wrong with a modest pair like that. And they fit a modest girl like you.
Wow.
I'm glad you and I both see the goodness in people, Elizabeth.
Excuse me? Trick?
Excuse me? Is this a trick?
Excuse me? Is this a trick?
I thought so... Why? Is this a trick?
Oh really?
Look at that! You made a good choice. Good job, rookie.
On the contrary, I quite like this development.
The cards will decide that, Yew.
Shoes are the safe choice, of course. Unless you want to get rid of that cute little hairpin.
(Is that really focus? She seems like she's clocking out more than anything...)
Some people don't ever have contact with video games. Meia especially so, given her... background.
You seem troubled, Saki. What's wrong?
A hand-guy? You sound like you have a lot of troubles.
I'm flattered, but I'm not that pretty.
Part of the uniform? Or jusst a fashion choice?
They make video games about Greco-Roman gods? And they know about that? Talk about anachronism...
That seems like an obvious oversight of basic training. Just what does Palutena do all day?
Hey now, don't sell yourself short. You're amazing at video games!
(I don't like where this is going...)
Out of curiosity, does the Berry Big Circus ring any bells to you?
Well, she won this hand, so she has at least a little luck on her side!
I'm not very good at riddles.
I bet it's more comfortable, too!
I'm not very familiar with clown terminology. What's the difference?
Oh, an armband! I thought those went out of style years ago.
Please, Ms. Dupain-Cheng, be honest with us. We want to know.
Where I come from, it's usually the hairstyles that are more eye-catching than the colors.
Can't blame you for that one. Your options were kind of limited to begin with.
Please, Ms. Dupain-Cheng, be honest with us. We want to know.
With you two here? That was obvious from the start.
Already? This feels like it went too fast!
Please, Ms. Dupain-Cheng, be honest with us. We want to know.
(She just started doing it without Miko's say-so! Should I raise an objection?)
Is this necessary? Can't you pick them yourself?
Since when has Feudal Japan had access to headphones?
Both? That seems hardly necessary...
You should probably let her do as she pleases...
If it makes you feel better, someone had to lose. It's just bad luck on your part.
You don't have to justify yourself, Ms. Natsuki.
Oh, yes! Bracelets! How lovely.
Your name, by the way. It's very... unique.
Never seen someone with a circlet.
...Did you just combust?
Those are boots, you know...
Uh, sure... your "comms". Whatever you say.
Oh, really? How curious.
(...Elizabeth doesn't seem like a "ma'am.")
Hey, Sola, you're... maybe rubbing it in a bit too hard?
Maybe we can start with the fact that there's two of them?
You just give off that impression, Sola.
One shoe, two shoes...
Are you saying she's even grumpier than this? I can hardly imagine?
Join me in indecency, ~name~.
That's great and all, but we're not here for your lore.
E-Everyone get down!
Judging from that skirt, I'd guess... no?
So is that a genuine skirt or just leaves.
What's the matter? Couldn't back up your bluff?
Brace yourself, Yew. This is very much happening.
Onto the important stuff now, are we?
(Just what we need... two flying dummies.)
No problem! Someone like you can handle even this much, right Chiaki?
(What am I not getting from this? I thought it'd be obvious, but...)
Normally breakdowns don't occur this early in...
Snake? Sounds dangerous.
Is this what Phoenix puts up with with that daughter of his?
That seems a little... suspicious.
Not the most modest person I've met. Or smartest, for that matter.
You two are being rather... civil with each other, all things considered.
Did you give up?
I guess as long as Tojiko there is on top of things, it doesn't really matter, does it?
You almost lived up to your title there for a minute!
Really? How'd you pull it off? Braces?
Oh! Seems like being as small as you are served as an advantage.
Oh? Where's your evidence?
A spirit?
You've come far since the start of this.
(She really needs help... in more ways than one.)
A double hit... how cold.
(Did she rig these up herself? Or is it an outsider? Maybe... ~player~?)
The whole dress? That's unnecessary, don't you think?
Inevitable, sure, but it didn't have to be this very minute, you know.
That's probably true. Not that she'd have a reason to lie...
(Maybe that's where the Empress's New Clothes comes from... Zizou?)
Did I read the rules wrong?
Feels good, doesn't it?
Found a new hobby, ~name~?
I guess this is a victory? Alright...
You're not hurt, are you?
Excellent. Now, let's behave nice and civilly until the game ends, okay?
Now, maybe you can play a minigame: try and guess who'll lose next!
(Better than an axe-murderer side.)
Didn't you two meet, like thirty minutes ago?
That's a... good kitty? Hmmm. I'm not sure if I should talk to you in cat-speak. Do you mind?
Thank you for your time, Ms. Grimaldi. That was very... educational.
With no hands? How'd you do that?
So messy... and I think you almost hit ~player~ with that squirt.
Looks like Juri's out. (Always wanted to say that!)
If you are arrested, know that our Agency has no intentions of taking your defense.
I'm glad this ended well for all of us! You two get some rest.
Ah! She's fingered you, ~player~! Anything to say for yourself?
I guess this isn't that different from me and Maya, but at least we were up front about it!
You've really never had an orgasm before? You need to get out more.
(I'm pretty sure scissoring goes against several rules here...)
I forgot that little guy was here. But it's nice to see again!
(Is that technically squirting?)
Share your secrets, ~name~!
Go ahead ~name~, we're waiting.
Only if this gets out... right?
You get used to it. Maya really needs to start wearing a bra one of these days...
That'd require two of you, though.
At least the only one you can hurt with a shot like that is you.
It didn't go that high...
I almost expected that to come off sooner.
Aren't you embarrassed? At all? These are your breasts, you know?
You're counting those?
Yep! No idea why you're laughing, though...
"Those" types of games?
(Maybe your parents should have named you Horseshoe instead.)
You don't have a razor, though...
Can't hide a banana up there. Let's see.
Hopefully you won't have to revise your testimony again.
We already saw the "real" Ms. Kujoh. Things should go smoothly from here on out!
Please, Ms. Dupain-Cheng, be honest with us. We want to know.
Ms. Han, that hardly qualifies as a top in the first place! It's more like... a breastplate.
If there's some sort of cops-and-robbers romance here, I think it's rather one-sided.
There are a lot of measurements you can use to judge one's worth. Having large chest is nice, but that's hardly all there is.
(Another rambler... great.)
You'll be the first to unveil yourself, then? You should consider it an honor, really.
You're no normal spirit to just burn that away.
This must be a first among the Oracles.
(Does that even qualify as a leotard? It looks more like a bunch of ribbons...)
(She's dedicated to the bit, I'll give her that.)
(I don't get why that hat's so valuable to her, but this is what she wants...)
C'mon, Sola! Don't you believe in us?
We're counting on you. After all, I know you're strong enough to do this.
Losing's not that bad, all things considered.
Don't worry, I'll defend you if you're arrested for public indecency.
It's so nice not having to worry about losng anymore! I can just watch you do this with no drawbacks!
Did I help? I hope so.
It's a shame we couldn't do it at the same time, ~name~. You look like you'd be fun.
I thought I was a decent player.
Lucky shot.
It's okay, Florina. If she harms a single hair on your head, you can be sure I'm getting the police involved.
It's a little suspicious, I have to agree.
Regular bullets are bad enough!
Palutena, please. You have the power to stop this, right?
Perhaps that's a sign you should stop?
I didn't notice... oh! It's alright though, ~player~. I don't judge.
Part of you? So that's... an organ?
Just like I thought earlier, nothing to it!
Quite the interesting Court Record we'll be developing today.
Sure. Just don't throw it to my feet!
No offense, but Saki doesn't seem very competitive.
Exactly! It's more rewarding to play the side that protects the innocent!
From just the stockings?
Er... thanks?
Sure! No complaints here!
(Ms. Han might need a reminder of how to play.)
That's... not the point.
A yokai? Maybe a spirit?
Not that it really makes a difference, but a blazer's something, I guess.
Great! Glad to hear, Natsuki.
Exactly. You have no right to complain with how dressed you are!
Ah, right. Either way, your... cardigan is out of the way.
Ah! Well, I'm glad you're staying.
You're doing great! Just keep going like that.
sad,...Can she even talk?
Such a dramatic way to lose clothes.
They're going fast!
Is that a mascot of some sort? Like the Blue Badger?
I ask that you keep from badgering Ms. Sola, ~player~.
I think they're perfectly fitting for a school girl, but you do you.
Can't really say much there, considering who's body I'm in...
Just be glad there isn't much left for you, Sola.
I'm well-known for my gentle touch. You have nothing to fear.
How about you give me a good memory?
I'm done...
I must really be out of practice if this rookie could beat me this bad...
Same to you, Ms. Naked-In-Public. As fun as the two of us could be together, I'm only here for the night.
What's that supposed to mean?
Mahiru, I'm going to need to see those photos. For purely legal reasons, of course. Don't want everybody's nudes leaking and circulating around, right?
Please don't tell the Agency about this.
You, uh, didn't tape that or anything, did you?
I, uh, hope you don't think less of me for that.
So when can I get dressed? This is kind of embarrassing...
Right... so... how's everyone doing?
Can someone hand me a towel? I'd rather not stand here in my own juices.
It's a good thing Maya is unconscious while I use her body. I'm not sure she could handle a place like this.
I may have lost, but this has still been a pretty fun night.
If nothing else, tonight made for good practice for my games with Phoenix.
I think this was a good use of my time back.
Wouldn't it be just my luck if someone got murdered tonight...? Nah, that would never happen.
None of you are very adept at cards, are you?
Well, long as I'm out, might as well enjoy the festivities.
Congratulations, ~name~. Your win was well-earned.

text.content: There's not much time left. Time to submit Exhibit D!
Ahhhh! Ahhhh!
If there's one thing I miss most about being alive, it's probably liaisons like this, ~name~.
I wish I could enjoy you longer, but I've already drained her of so much spiritual power today.
Maya's had to get used to waking up to some pretty sticky situations after channeling me!
Say hi to my sister for me, won't you?
Huh?
Ah! You're naked! And I'm...
She told me she was just going to play cards this time...
But here I am in my apartment totally wet. Again.
It could be worse. This guy is really cute.
And at least she isn't having Pearly do this...
Well, since we're here already...
Wanna have some fun?
That was amazing, ~name~!
The way you used your tongue... Ema would be jealous!
It, um, was totally necessary for recharging my channeling power, of course.
I'm opening the connection to my sister now.
Please be gentle. No rope marks! Remember, it's still my body.
~name~. Hello.
I see that you and Maya had some fun.
Oh, she said no bondage tonight?
Why don't you get some of Maya's toys? They're in the dresser.
Yes, the Steel Samurai one. Turn it on.
Wait, get a second one. We'll go together.
Oh... Ahh... Just a little higher...
Excellent technique, ~name~.
Now get out of that bra and go get me the rope.
